game.name: Wife of My Boss
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: When your boss is an asshole who ruins your life - it's time to take revenge and steal his wife!
game.shortDescriptionEn: When your boss is an asshole who ruins your life - it's time to take revenge and steal his wife!

reviewHighlights.text: I am utterly disapointed... waited for a year for it to go on sale, only to be met with a boring story that is complete ass. no shaggin in a game like...
i finished it ten minutes looking for sex scenes there is no skip button so i was just continuously clicking and if there was maybe it was in text sin...
